reports.title: Training Progress Report - Block 5 Week 2
highlights: Antagonist bench + row pairing unlocked 4x10 @ 40x2 lb while rows held 50 lb.
Close-grip DB press regained 10/10/8 once moved to straight sets.
Hip thrust + goblet squat climbed to 60 lb x 15/10 across 3 rounds.
Standing calf raise now hits twice per week for 5,400 lb weekly load.
Optional 4 mi run at 8:57/mi kept recovery aerobic.

reports.title: Training Progress Report - Block 5 Week 1
highlights: Excellent hypertrophy mesocycle launch with superset-dense programming
Perfect RPE discipline: All sessions 7.0-7.7 avg (below 8.0 target)
Smart load reductions (10-15% from Block 4) enabled high-rep targets
Injury-free transition to 10-15 rep range from 6-8 rep strength phase
3/3 sessions completed with excellent superset fatigue management

reports.title: Training Progress Report - Blocks 2, 3 & 4
highlights: Hammer Curls +140% volume, Biceps Curls +120% - exceptional arm development
Upper body pulling +50% volume - One-Arm Row and Chest-Supported Row
Bulgarian Split Squats +52% volume, +90% raw load
Perfect periodization with all deloads executed properly

reports.title: Training Progress Report - Block 4
highlights: Lower body strength +12.5-25% across all major lifts
